title: Will world technology dependence ever slow down? Or is the goal to get everyone dependent on technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Shalom The world is going to be more and dependent on technology as this is the next slave of the mankind. The only chance/way that this will not happen is if people feel that they become the servants of the technology and will slow it down. But, as mankind is blind ad lazy-it will never happen and the technology is going to fully lead the world. In friendship Rima

Humanity is dependent on technology, go to the most primitive tribes in the world and they will be using technology. Fire, sandals, spears, etc. Technology is one of the defining elements of mankind, we have used technology from our beginning. Pre-modern man technology was being used.
